title: What motivates students to pursue a career in gerontological nursing? The cultural adaptation and validation of the Spanish version of the CMGN questionnaire
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Josune Zubeldia-Etxeberria, Beatriz Pereda-Goikoetxea, Udane Elordi-Güenaga, Nagore Zinkunegi-Zubizarreta, Nerea Elisabethe Liceaga-Otazu, Begoña Sanz, Maider Ugartemendia-Yerobi
